properties.media:imagetext:
727-200
For Your Safety
Para Su Seguridad
Pour Votre Sécurité
Für Ihre Sicherheit
Sun Country Airlines®
Emergency exits are often heavy, awkward to lift, push, pull, and maneuver when opening. Because of this, and for the
benefit of all passengers, Federal Law requires that we seat only able bodied passengers next to emergency exits.
If you are sitting in the row of seats next to an exit, you may be asked to open the exit and assist our crew in the event
of an emergency. Review this card for the functions to be performed. Exits should be operated only on the command of
a crewmember.
IF YOU ARE SITTING IN AN EXIT ROW, PLEASE ASK TO BE RESEATED IF:
• You have a physical condition which may not be visible and which may prevent you from assisting our crew.
• You lack the strength, mobility, dexterity in both arms, hands and legs to reach upward, sideways and downwards to
the locations of the exit and/or slide or cannot grasp, push, pull, turn or otherwise manipulate the operating mechanism.
• You are unable to reach the exit, to maintain balance and/or push, shove, pull or otherwise open the exit and to get
out quickly.
• You are unable to remove, lift out, deposit on a nearby seat, or maneuver over seatbacks to the next row objects or
obstructions the size and weight of overwing window exits.
• You are unable to stabilize an escape slide after deployment and/or unable to assist others in getting off an escape slide.
• You believe the physical exertion required to open the exit would injure you.
• You are hearing impaired and could not hear verbal commands from our crew.
• You are unable to give oral commands in English to other passengers.
• You do not understand the instructions in this brochure.
• You have other responsibilities (such as a small child to care for) which would prevent you from assisting our crew.
• You are less than 15 years old or lack the capacity to assist without help of another person.
• You do not wish to assist our crew in this way.
If you are sitting in an exit row and you cannot read
the small type on this card, or you cannot see well
enough to comply with these instructions, please
tell a crewmember.
Sun Country makes the final decision and determination if the exit row occupant is able to perform the applicable functions
Federal law requires all passengers, regardless of their seat location or physical condition, to review this important
intormation.
Follow these instructions, the directions of the crew, and posted signs.
Please do not remove this card from the aircraft.
Regulaciones Federales requieren que los pasajeros revisen esta información, la cual es importante para su seguridad
Siga estas instrucciones, las instrucciones de la tripulación, y las señales colocadas.
Por favor no se lleve esta tarjeta del avión.
Pour leur propre sécurité, la loi fédérale demande aux passagers d'examiner cette importante information.
Veuillez suivre ces instructions, celles de l'équipage ainsi que celles qui sont affichées.
Priere de laisser cette carte a bord.
Laut gesetzlicher Vorschrift müssen sich Fluggäste mit diesen wichtigen Informationen zu ihrer Sicherheit vertraut.
Folgen Sie diesen Anweisungen, der Beschilderung, und den Anweisungen des Bordpersonals.
Lassen Sie bitte diese Karte im Flugzeug.
Rev. 2/00
